backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature report listing updates to the Skills page and navigation labels with associated files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries for various frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color variables with light/dark theme tokens and global resets.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts and mounting the root React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root component rendering the animated background and the centered BookNavigator.
frontend/src/components/background/Anima: Renders layered warm gradient, animated overlay, and grain texture respecting reduced-motion preference.
frontend/src/components/book/BookNavigat: Provides React context for navigating to specific portfolio pages.
Manages page spreads, navigation, flip animations, keyboard controls, and layout switching.
frontend/src/components/book/PageFlipLay: Visual layer rendering the directional page-flip animation.
frontend/src/components/book/PaginationI: Displays current and total page counts in a styled badge.
frontend/src/components/book/useBookLayo: Hook detecting viewport width to switch between single and double page layouts.
frontend/src/features/portfolio/pages/Ab: Editorial about page detailing background, philosophy, and experience.
frontend/src/features/portfolio/pages/Co: Contact page with email, location, and social links presented in two-column layout.
Renders the portfolio cover with name, portrait image, and brief academic info.
frontend/src/features/portfolio/pages/Pr: Displays a featured project page with title, description, role, tech stack, and an image placeholder.
frontend/src/features/portfolio/pages/Sk: Shows lists of programming languages, built projects, and extra skills.
frontend/src/features/portfolio/pages/Ta: Generates a navigable table of contents for portfolio pages using book navigation context.
frontend/src/features/portfolio/portfoli: Defines the ordered list of portfolio pages and their components.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and utilities for Internet Identity authentication and state management.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: Hook that returns whether the user prefers reduced motion based on media query.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder hook for future backend queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and custom CSS variables for the editorial UI theme.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and extended theme options using CSS variables.
project_state.json: Tracks project state for updating the Skills page, including requirements, feature updates, and pending requests.
